item.description:
First meeting of the WordPress Developers Group in Manchester, NH. 

Let's set up some ground rules and meeting agendas for the coming year.

Do we want to set aside time each meeting for:

  • Presentations
  • Technical issues and resources discussions
  • Exploring new plugins and techniques
  • Comparing CMS tools
  • Showing off our designs
  • Sharing ideas to get more projects/customers

Other suggestions?  Want to be a presenter?  Submit your topic and we'll get you on the calendar.
item.how_to_find_us: 1st floor office. No need to feed the meter - parking is free after 5 pm.

group.name: Manchester, NH WordPress Developers and Users

item.name: Launch of the WordPress Developers Group in Manchester, NH
